meta.title: Privacy Policy | Print7
meta.description: Print7’s privacy policy. We do not use analytics or marketing cookies; only data strictly necessary for site operation and security.

heading: Privacy Policy
intro: This Policy explains how Print7 processes personal data when you visit our portfolio website. The site is purely informational and does not use analytics or marketing cookies.

controller.heading: Data Controller
controller.body:
Print7 – Design e Publicidade
Rua Nossa Senhora do Carmo, 22A, 2900-146 Setúbal, Portugal
Email: geral@print7.pt

logs.title: Technical access data (server logs):
logs.text: IP address, date/time, requested URL, user-agent, referrer. Purpose: security, stability and abuse prevention.

contact.title: Contact form (if available):
contact.text: name, email and message — solely to respond to your enquiry.

cookies.heading: Cookies
cookies.text: We do not use analytics, marketing or profiling cookies. If, in the future, features requiring cookies are introduced (e.g., language preferences), we will inform you and, where applicable, seek prior consent.

legit.title: Legitimate interests:
legit.text: security, operation and abuse prevention (technical logs).

contract.title: Pre-contractual steps/contract performance:
contract.text: responding to your enquiry via form or email.

processors.heading: Sharing and processors
processors.text: We may use service providers (hosting) processing data on our behalf under appropriate contracts and safeguards. We do not sell personal data.

logs.title: Technical logs:
logs.text: retained only as long as necessary for security and diagnostics.

contacts.title: Contact requests:
contacts.text: kept as needed to respond and comply with applicable obligations.

rights.heading: Your rights
rights.text: You have the rights of access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability and objection under the GDPR. You may exercise them by email. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority.

transfers.heading: International transfers
transfers.text: We do not transfer data outside the EEA unless necessary and with appropriate safeguards.

security.heading: Security
security.text: We implement technical and organisational measures to protect data against unauthorised access, loss or alteration.

changes.heading: Changes to this Policy
changes.text: We may update this Policy to reflect legal or operational changes. We will publish the updated version on this page, indicating the date.
